price: ពួកដែលគ្មានជំនឿស្រមើស្រមៃថា (ពួកគេនឹងបានចូល ឋានសួគ៌ដែរ) បើពួកគេជាមូស្លីមវិញនោះ។
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
